text: @JNJNews @JanssenGlobal Our bodies have the ability to heal, our bodies were made to fight against viruses.The more vaccines you put in people the weaker their immune systems get.  we do not need Mouse Retro Active Viruses or an embryo’s DNA to fight COVID19.We need Cotamin A, C, Zinc and non GMO foods.
